clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Pharmacokinetics of Hydroxynitone Capsules in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the pharmacokinetic characteristics of hydronidone capsules (specification: 30 mg/ pill) in healthy subjects And the effect of feeding on pharmacokinetics to provide evidence for phase II/III clinical trial protocols.
